prepareAjaxForm

public def prepareAjaxForm(def attrs)
success out << 'success:function(data,textStatus){' if(attrs.onLoaded) out << "${attrs.onLoaded};" if(attrs.update instanceof Map) { if(attrs.update?.success) { out << "jQuery('#${attrs.update.success}').html(data);" } } else if(attrs.update) { out << "jQuery('#${attrs.update}').html(data);" } if(attrs.onSuccess) out << "${attrs.onSuccess};" out << '}' //*** failure out << ',error:function(XMLHttpRequest,textStatus,errorThrown){' if (attrs.update instanceof Map) { if (attrs.update?.failure) { out << "jQuery('#${attrs.update?.failure}').html(textStatus);" } } if (attrs.onFailure) out << "${attrs.onFailure};" out << '}' if(attrs.onComplete) out << ",complete:function(XMLHttpRequest,textStatus){${attrs.onComplete}}" } /** Prepares an AJAX-Form. Thx to jQuery it is a simple serialize-call

attrs attrs.params to serialize
